bro is so confusing but eassyyy

i speedrun game in 4 hour
Loved the story, however the physics in the in the last fight's cutscene are a bit questionable.
Still one of the best games I've ever played.
Glados made me post this positive review. 100% would recommend to a friend.
Good game. Would buy again if I could

glados es un amor, muy pocos personajes de videojuegos son comparables con glados. este juego vale la pena solo por ella.

This game is really cool because the community test chambers add a lot of play after you get through the whole game and much of it is hard enough that if you play again months later, you might not remember it well so it's fun to play again.
If you're feeling down, or just want to become x200 happier than you were 10 minutes ago, just buy this game. Even if you have not played Portal (first one), you'll have a blast playing this one.

Tutaj rÃ³wnieÅ¼ gra wychodzi Å›wietnie. Po prostu sterowanie jak z portal 1. Nic dodaÄ‡, nic ujÄ…Ä‡

Tutaj fabuÅ‚a jest po prostu cudowna. Dialogi mistrzowsko napisane, fabuÅ‚a wciÄ…ga a aktorzy gÅ‚osowi tworzÄ… idealnÄ… robotÄ™ (zwÅ‚aszcza J. K. Simmons). Dodatkowo otrzymujemy teÅ¼ kampaniÄ™ dla dwÃ³ch graczy ktÃ³ra nie odstaje od reszty i moÅ¼na z niej czerpaÄ‡ tyle samo radoÅ›ci.

A, i jeszcze w 2012 doszedÅ‚ dodatek darmowy gdzie moÅ¼esz tworzyÄ‡ wÅ‚asne komory i graÄ‡ w testy innych, co teÅ¼ jest kozackim pomysÅ‚em.

Really interesting and challenging puzzles with great jokes.  Co-op campaign is pretty fun but doesn't have that much of a story. The singleplayer has an really good story though. There's also workshop support so once you finish you can play tons of other community levels and maps. The price is a steal too. This game is easily worth Â£25, but its only Â£7.19, and Â£1.43 on sale.
Me ha gustado mucho para jugar con amigos y resolver puzles
its good me and my Friend hade fun
